H0.text: Which is the largest city in Scandinavia by population . Oslo

H1.text: Which is the largest city in Scandinavia by population . Copenhagen

H2.text: Which is the largest city in Scandinavia by population . Helsinki

H3.text: Which is the largest city in Scandinavia by population . STHLM

A4.text: Copenhagen is the capital and most populous city in the Kingdom of Denmark, with a population of 667,000 people in the municipality and 1.4 million in the urban area.
